# Usage

	./typicalw annotate

## Configuration List
| Field Name | Default | Required | 
|---|---|:---:|
| APP_ADDRESS | :8089 | Yes |
| APP_DEBUG | true |  |
| REDIS_HOST | localhost | Yes |
| REDIS_PORT | 6379 | Yes |
| REDIS_PASSWORD | redispass |  |
| PG_DBNAME | MyLibrary | Yes |
| PG_DBUSER | pguser | Yes |
| PG_DBPASS | pgpass |  |
| PG_HOST | localhost | Yes |
| PG_PORT | 5432 | Yes |

## DotEnv example
```
APP_ADDRESS=:8089
APP_DEBUG=true
REDIS_HOST=localhost
REDIS_PORT=6379
REDIS_PASSWORD=redispass
PG_DBNAME=MyLibrary
PG_DBUSER=pguser
PG_DBPASS=pgpass
PG_HOST=localhost
PG_PORT=5432
```
